TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 标识以视觉样式绘制的控件或用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Identifies a control or user interface (UI) element that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类标识由操作系统的当前视觉样式定义的 Windows 控件或用户界面 (UI) 元素。The class identifies a Windows control or user interface (UI) element that is defined by the current visual style of the operating system. 视觉样式元素是根据 *类*、 *部件*和 *状态*定义的：A visual style element is defined in terms of *class*, *part*, and *state*: - *类*标识一组相关的视觉样式元素，这些元素通常一起绘制。The *class* identifies a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 类由 属性指定。The class is specified by the property. - *部分*定义了类的离散成员。The *part* defines a discrete member of a class. 部分由 属性指定。The part is specified by the property. - *状态*描述由类和部件定义的元素的当前可视状态。The *state* describes the current visual state of the element defined by the class and part. 状态由 属性指定。The state is specified by the property. 命名空间公开了数百个 对象，这些对象表示可由视觉样式定义的控件和用户界面元素。The namespace exposes hundreds of objects that represent the controls and user interface elements that can be defined by a visual style. 这些对象公开为 `static` 的嵌套类的属性 。These objects are exposed as `static` properties of nested classes of . 对于每个属性，所属类的限定名称表示所绘制元素的类和部分，属性名称表示元素的状态。For each property, the qualified name of the owning class represents the class and the part of the drawn element, and the property name represents the state of the element. 例如， 属性返回一个 ，该对象可用于以视觉样式绘制处于按下状态的按钮。For example, the property returns a that can be used to draw a button in the pressed state with visual styles. `Pressed`属性名称对应于状态，对应于 `PushButton` 部分，并 `Button` 标识视觉样式元素的类。The `Pressed` property name corresponds to the state, `PushButton` corresponds to the part, and `Button` identifies the class of the visual style element. 若要绘制视觉样式元素，请创建 ，将其设置为要绘制的，然后 调用 方法。To draw a visual style element, create a , set it to the you wish to draw, and then call the method. 若要确定当前视觉样式是否提供特定元素的定义，请 使用元素作为参数调用方法。To determine whether the current visual style provides a definition for a particular element, call the method with the element as the argument. 和 包装 Windows 平台 SDK 的 Windows Shell 部分的视觉样式 API 功能。 and wrap the functionality of the visual styles API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK. 有关视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅 [视觉样式](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/themes-overview)。For more information on visual styles, see [Visual Styles](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/themes-overview). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，它提供了用于浏览和绘制 由命名空间公开的所有对象的 UI 。The following code example is a complete application that provides a UI for browsing and drawing all of the objects exposed by the namespace. 若要查看元素，请使用 窗口左侧的控件导航到表示要绘制的元素状态的节点，然后单击该节点。To view an element, use the control on the left side of the window to navigate to the node that represents the state of the element you want to draw, and then click the node. 仅当元素由当前视觉样式定义时，此示例才会绘制所选元素。This sample will draw the selected element only if the element is defined by the current visual style. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取此 表示的视觉样式元素的类名。

span.span: Gets the class name of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的类名的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the class name of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类名引用一组相关的视觉样式元素，这些元素通常一起绘制。A class name refers to a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 类名称可以与控件（如 "滚动条" 和 "跟踪条"）相对应，但类名称还可以引用与特定控件不对应的一组元素，例如 "EXPLORERBAR" 和 "STARTPANEL"。A class name can correspond to a control, such as "SCROLLBAR" and "TRACKBAR", but a class name can also refer to a group of elements that do not correspond to a particular control, such as "EXPLORERBAR" and "STARTPANEL". 有关视觉样式类、部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅 [部件和状态](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see [Parts and States](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此 表示的视觉样式元素的部件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the part of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的部件的值。

span.span: A value that represents the part of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件是视觉样式元素类的离散成员。A part is a discrete member of a class of visual style elements. 例如，表示复选框、单选按钮和 "推送" 按钮的视觉样式元素都被视为 "BUTTON" 类的一部分。For example, visual style elements that represent a check box, radio button, and push button are all considered parts of the "BUTTON" class. 部分值是从1到为特定类定义的部分数之间的整数。Part values are integers that range from 1 to the number of parts defined for a particular class. 有关视觉样式类、部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅 [部件和状态](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see [Parts and States](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此 表示的视觉样式元素的状态。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the state of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 一个表示视觉样式元素的状态的值。

span.span: A value that represents the state of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视觉样式部件可以有一个或多个可视状态。A visual style part can have one or more visual states. 例如，表示单选按钮的视觉样式元素可以处于禁用、选中或取消选中状态。For example, a visual style element that represents a radio button can be in the disabled, checked, or unchecked state. 状态值是从1到为特定部分定义的状态数之间的整数。State values are integers that range from 1 to the number of states defined for a particular part. 有关视觉样式类、部件和状态的详细信息，请参阅 [部件和状态](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see [Parts and States](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/controls/parts-and-states).
